titleStmt.title: A letter from the Assembly of Divines in England and the commissioners of the Church of Scotland written, and sent by order of the honorable House of Commons assembled in Parliament, to the Belgicke, French, Helvetian, and other reformed churches / translated into English and now published with the severall inscriptions to those churches by order of the said House.
Literae a Conventu Theologorum in Anglia et Ecclesiae Scoticanae delegatis. English
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly
Lauderdale, John Maitland, Duke of, 1616-1682.
Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes for Ralph Smith, and are to be sold at his Shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Jo. Maitland [etc.], commissioners of the Church of Scotland.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
